sn11.5:1.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devā ca asurā ca pārisajje ṭhapesuṃ:
sn11.5:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.10: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:1.13: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn11.5:3.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinā asurindena gāthāya asurā anumodiṃsu, devā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:3.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:3.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn11.5:5.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthāya, devā anumodiṃsu, asurā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:5.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:5.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
sn11.5:7.1: Bhāsitāya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittinā asurindena gāthāya asurā anumodiṃsu, devā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:7.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca:
sn11.5:7.4: Evaṃ vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
sn11.5:14.1: Bhāsitāsu kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devānamindena gāthāsu, devā anumodiṃsu, asurā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
sn11.5:14.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, devānañca asurānañca pārisajjā etadavocuṃ:
sn11.5:14.4: Tā ca kho sadaṇḍāvacarā sasatthāvacarā, iti bhaṇḍanaṃ iti viggaho iti kalaho.
sn11.5:14.6: Tā ca kho adaṇḍāvacarā asatthāvacarā, iti abhaṇḍanaṃ iti aviggaho iti akalaho.
sn11.5:14.8: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sakkassa devānamindassa subhāsitena jayo ahosī”ti.
